tool_description: A Trading Econmics Scraper is a tool that extracts valuable data from the tradingeconomics website, providing real-time insights for traders and analyst
name: Trading Econmics Scraper
title: Trading Econmics Scraper

api_list.name: Get Calendar Details
api_list.description: The TradingEconomics Calendar Data API offers users real-time financial event information straight from the TradingEconomics website. Spanning events from 2013 to 2023, users can obtain vital insights for several global economies. Tailored for traders and market analysts, this instrument presents detailed event descriptions, anticipated market effects, and expert annotations, all smoothly incorporated via Rapid API for enlightened trading choices and comprehensive market comprehension.

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description:
To represent time offsets, use the format 'UTC±[offset]'. Examples include

- 'UTC-12'
- 'UTC-11'
- 'UTC-10'
- 'UTC-9'
- 'UTC-8'
- 'UTC-7'
- 'UTC-6'
- 'UTC-5'
- 'UTC-4'
- 'UTC-3'
- 'UTC-2'
- 'UTC-1'
- 'UTC'
- 'UTC+1'
- 'UTC+2'
- 'UTC+3'
- 'UTC+3:30'
- 'UTC+4'
- 'UTC+4:30'
- 'UTC+5'
- 'UTC+5:30'
- 'UTC+5:45'
- 'UTC+6'
- 'UTC+7'
- 'UTC+8'
- 'UTC+9'
- 'UTC+9:30'
- 'UTC+10'
- 'UTC+10:30'
- 'UTC+11'
- 'UTC+12'
- 'UTC+13'
- 'UTC+14'
